RGResponsive

  • Download ZIP File
  • Download TAR Ball
  • View On GitHub

This project is a responsive Wordpress theme. I’ve started to work on this because I wanted to standardize the general aspect of my different websites (my blog and the blog of my developments).

You can find the sources for this theme on GitHub (you can also directly download the Zip archive).

The complete documentation to create a Wordpress theme can be found here.

The font used in this theme is Roboto.

When developing a theme, there are 2 very useful plugins:

  • theme-check, which runs tests on your theme and compare it to the Wordpress standards and practices,
  • toolbar-theme-switcher, which allows you to switch between your installed themes from the toolbar.

The Wordpress Codex also provides some test data that you can import by using the wordpress-importer plugin. The test data contains a large number of posts, pages and comments, from almost every type/format. After importing and configuring your blog for the unit tests, you can check that everything is behaving as expected.

I will continue to update this page as I work on the theme.
